projects.title: Senior Trike Project
projects.description: Competition trike designed and built from the ground up: CAD & FEA of a 4130/1018 steel frame, TIG welding & machining, drivetrain optimization, and DFM/DFA changes that cut assembly time and reduced BOM cost while maintaining safety factors.

projects.title: Mechatronics Sensor Payload
projects.description: Multi-sensor payload for a UAV platform: IMU, temperature, and distance sensing; PWM motor/servo control; PID tuning to minimize overshoot; C++/Python logic; safe-states and telemetry for reliable field testing.

projects.title: Autonomous Rescue Robot
projects.description: Autonomous ground robot that navigates to targets and retrieves them with a modular hook/actuator. Ultrasonic and IR sensing, Python control stack, and robust behaviors validated across obstacle courses.
